features.title: Why creators, marketers, and businesses love URLINK
features.subtitle: Whether you're growing an audience, promoting a product, or running paid campaigns ‚Äî URLINK helps you do it better, with less.

card.disclaimer: Free forever. No hidden fees. No credit card required.

0.question: Is URLINK really free?
0.answer: Yes! You get 500 clicks completely free to test the platform. No credit card required.

1.question: How does the PPC payment system work?
1.answer: You only pay when someone clicks your link. No monthly plans, no commitments.

2.question: Can I track my link performance?
2.answer: Absolutely. You get real-time analytics and full UTM tracking ‚Äî all included for free.

3.question: What is a deep link and does URLINK support it?
3.answer: A deep link sends users directly into apps like Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, or Amazon ‚Äî to the exact content you want. Yes, URLINK supports smart deep linking across most major platforms.

4.question: Is there a limit to how many links I can create?
4.answer: Nope! You can create unlimited links and dynamic QR codes with your free account.

5.question: Can I customize the links I generate?
5.answer: Yes ‚Äî you can edit titles, apply UTMs, and regenerate dynamic QR codes at any time.

6.question: Does URLINK work with ads and marketing campaigns?
6.answer: Yes. Use your deep links across social media, newsletters, paid ads, and more.

7.question: How do I get started?
7.answer: Just paste your first link and sign up. It takes less than 30 seconds and you're in ‚Äî no payment needed.

0.question: How do I create a deep link?
0.answer: Simply paste your URL in the link generator, and we'll automatically create a deep link that works across all platforms. We support major platforms like Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and more.

1.question: What's included in the free plan?
1.answer: The free plan includes 500 clicks per month, unlimited link creation, and basic analytics. You can track clicks, geographic data, and device types without any cost.

2.question: How does the pay-per-click billing work?
2.answer: You only pay for clicks beyond your free monthly limit. Each additional click costs ‚Ç¨0.003, and you're billed monthly only for what you use. No fixed fees or hidden costs.

3.question: Can I customize my deep links?
3.answer: Yes! You can add UTM parameters, customize fallback URLs, and set specific behaviors for different platforms. This helps you track campaign performance and improve user experience.

4.question: What happens if I reach my click limit?
4.answer: If you're on the free plan and reach 500 clicks, you'll need to upgrade to continue receiving clicks. For paid users, you'll be billed automatically for additional clicks at the end of your billing cycle.

5.question: How do I track link performance?
5.answer: Your dashboard shows real-time analytics including total clicks, geographic distribution, device types, and conversion rates. You can export data and integrate with popular analytics platforms.

support.title: Need help?
support.description: Our support team is here to help you get the most out of URLINK. Reach out anytime or browse our resources below.

0.title: How to use deeplinks?
0.content:
‚Ä¢ Deeplinks are smart URLs that open content directly in apps
‚Ä¢ To create one:
  - Paste your URL in the link generator
  - Choose your target platform (auto or manual)
  - Customize settings if needed
  - Copy and share your deeplink

1.title: How to upgrade?
1.content:
‚Ä¢ Go to Billing & Subscription
‚Ä¢ Click "Change Plan"
‚Ä¢ Add your payment method
‚Ä¢ Start using premium features immediately

2.title: Where can I find my invoices?
2.content:
‚Ä¢ Visit the Billing & Subscription page
‚Ä¢ Scroll to Billing History
‚Ä¢ Click "View" next to any invoice to download
‚Ä¢ We also email invoices monthly to your registered email
